alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 24 at 12:19PM MST until February 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe aircraft turbulence may be possible, especially for small aircraft in the vicinity of the mountains.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
